channel.title: Portfolio - VG Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on VG Homepage

item.title: The PhD Thesis Latex Template for PhD students from TRAIL Research School, The Netherlands
item.description: The latex format is checked and confirmed by Trail, together with online demo and detail instructions. If you are the PhD student struggling with the Latex for your Thesis, this is exactly what you need.

item.title: Detecting Objects on Multiple Images using You Only Look Once (Yolo)
item.description: Object detection is a common machine learning task. One of the widely used object detection tool is *You Only Look Once (Yolo)*, which is implemented based on the Darknet, an Open Source Neural Networks in C. In this project, I improved the YOLO by adding several convenient functions for detecting objects for research and the development community.
